entities.name: centaurs
entities.description: A group of centaurs filling the clearing. ("the fifty or so centaurs filling the clearing")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the three people in the clearing, along with Hermione and the centaurs. ("Harry, Hermione, and the fifty or so centaurs filling the clearing")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of the three people in the clearing, along with Harry and the centaurs. ("Harry, Hermione, and the fifty or so centaurs filling the clearing")

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: A monstrous form of a giant who appears in the gap between two tree trunks. ("the monstrous form of Grawp the giant appeared in the gap")

relationships.description: The centaurs are facing Grawp, with their bows and arrows pointing upward at him. ("all of them — Harry, Hermione, and the fifty or so centaurs filling the clearing — looked around")
The centaurs are facing Grawp, with their bows and arrows pointing upward at him. ("the centaurs nearest him backed into those behind")
Harry is helping Hermione after she was dropped to the ground. ("Harry hurried toward her as two thick tree trunks parted ominously and the monstrous form of Grawp the giant appeared in the gap")
